fullText:
Rough estimate: AI coding agents are currently 7800x faster than humans and introduces ~100 bugs per kloc.

Not all bugs are critical. Many commercial apps ships with 15-50 bugs/kloc. This is why they have tech support.

However, the important thing is iterations.
